languages.text:
"- Эй, Доу, ты чего там возишься? Большой запретил трогать товар.
- Отвали, Арли. Иди куда шел.
- Ты знаешь, у него везде есть уши.
- Отвали, сказал! Я не собираюсь гнить в этой дыре и ждать, пока у Пью мозги вправятся.
- Трон побери, Доу, мы и так четверых потеряли из-за этой ксенодряни! Положи камни, дружище, лучше пойдем напьемся.
- ...
- Доу, ты чего? Ты чего это, Доу? Н-нет, нет, отойди! А-а-а-а!"

- ...
- Доу, ты чего? Ты чего это, Доу? Н-нет, нет, отойди! А-а-а-а!"

languages.text:
"- Hey, Doe, what are you messing with? The big guy said not to touch the goods.
- Bugger off, Arlie. And mind your own business.
- He has ears everywhere, you know.
- I said, bugger off! I'm not going to rot in this hole until Pugh gets his shit together.
- Throne take you, Doe, we've already lost four men because of this xenos shit! Put the stones down, mate, what'd ya say we wet the old whistle instead.
- ...
- Doe, what are you doing? What are you doing, Doe? N-no, no, get away from me! A-a-argh!"

languages.text:
「- おい、ドー。何してんだ？あのデカブツに商品を触るなって言われただろ。
- うるせえぞ、アーリー。余計なことに口出しすんな。
- あいつは地獄耳だ。絶対にバレるって。
- うるせえって言っただろ！プフが正気に戻るまで待ってたら、この穴ん中で腐っちまう。
- ドー、異種族のブツのせいで仲間が4人も殺されてるんだぞ！石を置けってば。ほら、酒でも飲もうぜ？
- …
- ドー、何をしてるんだ？お、おい、ドー…や、やめろ！来るな！うわああ！」
languages.original_text:
"- Hey, Doe, what are you messing with? The big guy said not to touch the goods.
- Bugger off, Arlie. And mind your own business.
- He has ears everywhere, you know.
- I said, bugger off! I'm not going to rot in this hole until Pugh gets his shit together.
- Throne take you, Doe, we've already lost four men because of this xenos shit! Put the stones down, mate, what'd ya say we wet the old whistle instead.
- ...
- Doe, what are you doing? What are you doing, Doe? N-no, no, get away from me! A-a-argh!"

traits.locale_text:
「- おい、ドー。何してんだ？あのデカブツに商品を触るなって言われただろ。
- うるせえぞ、アーリー。余計なことに口出しすんな。
- あいつは地獄耳だ。絶対にバレるって。
- うるせえって言っただろ！プフが正気に戻るまで待ってたら、この穴ん中で腐っちまう。
- ドー、異種族のブツのせいで仲間が4人も殺されてるんだぞ！石を置けってば。ほら、酒でも飲もうぜ？
- …
- ドー、何をしてるんだ？お、おい、ドー…や、やめろ！来るな！うわああ！」

languages.text:
«- Oye, Doe, ¿con qué estás enredando? El jefe ha dicho que no toquemos la mercancía.
- Que te den, Arlie. No es asunto tuyo.
- Tiene oídos por todas partes, ¿sabes?
- ¡Te he dicho que te den! No voy a pudrirme aquí, en la mierda, hasta que Pugh deje de hacer el gilipollas.
- Por el Trono, Doe, ¡ya hemos perdido a cuatro por esta mierda xenos! Deja las piedras, colega, vamos a echar un trago y listo.
- ...
- Doe, ¿qué haces? ¿Qué estás haciendo, Doe? N-no, no, ¡aléjate de mí! ¡A-a-argh!».
languages.original_text:
"- Hey, Doe, what are you messing with? The big guy said not to touch the goods.
- Bugger off, Arlie. And mind your own business.
- He has ears everywhere, you know.
- I said, bugger off! I'm not going to rot in this hole until Pugh gets his shit together.
- Throne take you, Doe, we've already lost four men because of this xenos shit! Put the stones down, mate, what'd ya say we wet the old whistle instead.
- ...
- Doe, what are you doing? What are you doing, Doe? N-no, no, get away from me! A-a-argh!"

languages.text:
“- 喂，多伊，你在干什么？那个大块头吩咐过不要乱动货物。
- 滚蛋，阿利，少管闲事。
- 你知道吧？这里到处都有他的耳目。
- 我叫你滚开！鬼知道皮尤什么时候能收拾好他那堆破玩意，我可不想烂在这个洞里。
- 黄金王座诅咒你，多伊，我们已经为这堆异形破烂折进去四个人了！把石头放下，伙计，咱们去喝一杯如何？
- ……
- 多伊，你要干什么？你要干什么，多伊？不，不，走开！啊——啊——啊！”
languages.original_text:
"- Hey, Doe, what are you messing with? The big guy said not to touch the goods.
- Bugger off, Arlie. And mind your own business.
- He has ears everywhere, you know.
- I said, bugger off! I'm not going to rot in this hole until Pugh gets his shit together.
- Throne take you, Doe, we've already lost four men because of this xenos shit! Put the stones down, mate, what'd ya say we wet the old whistle instead.
- ...
- Doe, what are you doing? What are you doing, Doe? N-no, no, get away from me! A-a-argh!"

languages.text:
« Hé, Doe, qu'est-ce que tu fous ? Le patron a dit de pas toucher la marchandise.
– Lâche-moi, Arlie. Occupe-toi de tes oignons.
– Il a des oreilles partout, tu sais.
– Je t'ai dit de me lâcher ! Je vais pas pourrir dans ce trou en attendant que Pugh se ressaisisse.
– Que le Trône t'emporte, Doe ! On a déjà perdu quatre hommes à cause de ces saloperies xénos ! Repose donc ces pierres... Viens, on va aller se rincer le gosier, plutôt.
– ...
– Doe, qu'est-ce que tu fais ? Qu'est-ce qui t'arrive ? N-Non, non, t'approche pas de moi ! A-Argh ! »
languages.original_text:
"- Hey, Doe, what are you messing with? The big guy said not to touch the goods.
- Bugger off, Arlie. And mind your own business.
- He has ears everywhere, you know.
- I said, bugger off! I'm not going to rot in this hole until Pugh gets his shit together.
- Throne take you, Doe, we've already lost four men because of this xenos shit! Put the stones down, mate, what'd ya say we wet the old whistle instead.
- ...
- Doe, what are you doing? What are you doing, Doe? N-no, no, get away from me! A-a-argh!"

languages.text:
"- Hey, Doe, was soll denn das? Der Boss hat doch gesagt, wir sollen die Ware nicht anrühren.
- Verpiss Euch, Arlie. Und kümmert Euch um Euren Scheiß.
- Er hat überall Ohren, wisst Ihr?
- Verpisst Euch, sage ich! Ich werde nicht in diesem Drecksloch verrotten, bis Pugh seinen Scheiß endlich regelt.
- Möge der Thron Euch holen, Doe, wir haben wegen dieser Xenos-Scheiße schon vier Männer verloren! Legt die Steine weg, Kumpel, kippen wir uns lieber einen hinter die Binde.
- ...
- Doe, was soll denn das? Was macht Ihr da, Doe? N-Nein, nein, lasst mich! A-A-Argh!"

languages.text:
"- Doe, ne karıştırıyorsun sen öyle? Patron, mallara dokunmayın demişti.
- Bas git Arlie. Git kendi işine bak.
- Yerin kulağı var sonuçta.
- Bas git dedik! Pugh götünü kaldırmaya lütfedene kadar öylece bekleyecek değilim.
- Taht alsın seni Doe, bu zeno malları yüzünden dört adamımız gitti zaten! Bırak şu taşları be oğlum, gel seninle kafayı çekelim.
- ...
- Doe, ne yapıyorsun? Ne yapıyorsun Doe? H... Hayır, yaklaşma bana! Aaaaa!"
languages.original_text:
